#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int n,x,o,e;
	o=0;
	e=0;
	sc(n);
	while(n--)
	{
		sc(x);
		if(x&1)
		{
			o++;
		}
		else
		{
			e++;
		}
		}	
		pf(abs(o-e));
	return 0;	
}
